title: Sample, 1945–47
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave with paired and unpaired warps and areas of 1&3 interlacing
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 20 x 20 cm (7 7/8 x 7 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Striped sample with a warp of orange two-ply yarns, and a weft with bands of olive green chenille, bright yellow yarn, textured yarn, metallic threads, woven metallic and non-metallic tapes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, 1945–47.
1945–47. Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave with paired and unpaired warps and areas of 1&3 interlacing. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-48.
